__e: After an hour, Fernand gave a blank page. He insisted he'd drawn a white rabbit in the snow.
Like that bunny on TV with the battery, I just keep going and going and going.
When it comes to those fellas, I know where the bear sits in the buckwheat.
He's a big boy, he knows the road.
I get the whole theme of it, but I'll be the first one to tell you, the shit don't hold up.
I don't know, the rodeo ring, if you know what I'm talking about.
And do you know how many pockets he has?
It's different with a cat, they have 7 lives, a rabbit only has one.
A rabbit's work is never done.
Also, it's Christmastime and the rabbit's too big. Done.
You can look at it for hours and be absolutely sure it's a rabbit, but then one day you look at it and you realize-- wait a second-- it's a duck.
